# geoserver_user (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "geoserver_user" "project_reader" {
  name     = "my_reader"
  password = "e0dee5d6-f9dd-44cc-aaec-036be5fe5d42"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `enabled` (Boolean) Is the user account enabled?
- `name` (String) Name of the user. Used to compute the id of the resource.
- `password` (String, Sensitive) Password associated to the account.

### Optional

- `service_name` (String) Name of the usergroup service. If empty the default geoserver one will be used. Used to compute the id of the resource.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
